00025 XScalarEntry::XScalarEntry(const char *name, bool runtime, const shared_ptr<XDriver> &driver,
00026                            const char *format)
00027     : XNode(name, runtime),
00028       m_driver(driver),
00029       m_delta(create<XDoubleNode>("Delta", false)),
00030       m_store(create<XBoolNode>("Store", false)),
00031       m_value(create<XDoubleNode>("Value", true)),
00032       m_storedValue(create<XDoubleNode>("StoredValue", true)),
00033       m_bTriggered(false)
00034 {
00035     m_delta->setFormat(format);
00036     m_storedValue->setFormat(format);
00037     m_value->setFormat(format);
00038     store()->value(false);
00039 }
00040 bool
00041 XScalarEntry::isTriggered() const
00042 {
00043     return m_bTriggered;
00044 }
00045 void
00046 XScalarEntry::storeValue()
00047 {
00048     storedValue()->value(*value());
00049     m_bTriggered = false;
00050 }
00051 
00052 XString
00053 XScalarEntry::getLabel() const
00054 {
00055     return driver()->getLabel() + "-" + XNode::getLabel();
00056 }
00057 
00058 void
00059 XScalarEntry::value(double val)
00060 {
00061     if((*delta() != 0) && (fabs(val - *storedValue()) > *delta()))
00062     {
00063         m_bTriggered = true;
00064     }
00065     value()->value(val);
00066 }
00067 
00068 XValChart::XValChart(const char *name, bool runtime, const shared_ptr<XScalarEntry> &entry)
00069     : XNode(name, runtime),
00070       m_entry(entry),
00071       m_graph(create<XGraph>(name, false)),
00072       m_graphForm(new FrmGraph(g_pFrmMain))
00073 {
00074     m_graphForm->m_graphwidget->setGraph(m_graph);
00075     
00076     m_chart= m_graph->plots()->create<XXYPlot>(entry->getName().c_str(), true, m_graph);
00077     m_graph->persistence()->value(0.0);
00078     m_chart->label()->value(entry->getLabel());
00079     atomic_shared_ptr<const XNode::NodeList> axes_list(m_graph->axes()->children());
00080     shared_ptr<XAxis> axisx = dynamic_pointer_cast<XAxis>(axes_list->at(0));
00081     shared_ptr<XAxis> axisy = dynamic_pointer_cast<XAxis>(axes_list->at(1));
00082       
00083     m_chart->axisX()->value(axisx);
00084     m_chart->axisY()->value(axisy);
00085     m_chart->maxCount()->value(300);
00086     axisx->length()->value(0.95 - *axisx->x());
00087     axisy->length()->value(0.90 - *axisy->y());
00088     axisx->label()->value("Time");
00089     axisx->ticLabelFormat()->value("TIME:%T");
00090     axisy->label()->value(entry->getLabel());
00091     axisy->ticLabelFormat()->value(m_entry->value()->format());
00092     axisx->minValue()->setUIEnabled(false);
00093     axisx->maxValue()->setUIEnabled(false);
00094     axisx->autoScale()->setUIEnabled(false);
00095     axisx->logScale()->setUIEnabled(false);
00096     m_graph->label()->value(entry->getLabel());
00097 
00098     m_lsnOnRecord = entry->driver()->onRecord().connectWeak(
00099         shared_from_this(), &XValChart::onRecord);
00100 }
00101 void
00102 XValChart::onRecord(const shared_ptr<XDriver> &driver)
00103 {
00104     double val;
00105     val = *m_entry->value();
00106     XTime time = driver->time();
00107     if(time)
00108         m_chart->addPoint(time.sec() + time.usec() * 1e-6, val);
00109 }
00110 void
00111 XValChart::showChart(void)
00112 {
00113     m_graphForm->setWindowTitle(i18n("Chart - ") + getLabel() );
00114     m_graphForm->show();
00115 }
00116 
00117 XChartList::XChartList(const char *name, bool runtime, const shared_ptr<XScalarEntryList> &entries)
00118     : XAliasListNode<XValChart>(name, runtime),
00119       m_entries(entries)
00120 {
00121     m_lsnOnCatchEntry = entries->onCatch().connectWeak(
00122         shared_from_this(), &XChartList::onCatchEntry);
00123     m_lsnOnReleaseEntry = entries->onRelease().connectWeak(
00124         shared_from_this(), &XChartList::onReleaseEntry);
00125 }
00126 
00127 void
00128 XChartList::onCatchEntry(const shared_ptr<XNode> &node)
00129 {
00130     shared_ptr<XScalarEntry> entry = dynamic_pointer_cast<XScalarEntry>(node);
00131     create<XValChart>(entry->getName().c_str(), true, entry);
00132 }
00133 void
00134 XChartList::onReleaseEntry(const shared_ptr<XNode> &node)
00135 {
00136     shared_ptr<XScalarEntry> entry = dynamic_pointer_cast<XScalarEntry>(node);
00137 
00138     shared_ptr<XValChart> valchart;
00139     atomic_shared_ptr<const XNode::NodeList> list(children());
00140     if(list) {
00141         for(XNode::NodeList::const_iterator it = list->begin(); it != list->end(); it++) {
00142             shared_ptr<XValChart> chart = dynamic_pointer_cast<XValChart>(*it);
00143             if(chart->entry() == entry) valchart = chart;
00144         }
00145     }
00146     if(valchart) releaseChild(valchart);
00147 }
00148 
00149 XValGraph::XValGraph(const char *name, bool runtime,
00150                      const shared_ptr<XScalarEntryList> &entries)
00151     : XNode(name, runtime),
00152       m_graph(),
00153       m_graphForm(),
00154       m_axisX(create<tAxis>("AxisX", false, entries)),
00155       m_axisY1(create<tAxis>("AxisY1", false, entries)),
00156       m_axisZ(create<tAxis>("AxisZ", false, entries))
00157 {
00158     m_lsnAxisChanged = axisX()->onValueChanged().connectWeak(
00159         shared_from_this(), &XValGraph::onAxisChanged,
00160         XListener::FLAG_MAIN_THREAD_CALL | XListener::FLAG_AVOID_DUP);
00161     axisY1()->onValueChanged().connect(m_lsnAxisChanged);
00162     axisZ()->onValueChanged().connect(m_lsnAxisChanged);
00163 }
00164 void
00165 XValGraph::onAxisChanged(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &)
00166 {
00167     shared_ptr<XScalarEntry> entryx = *axisX();
00168     shared_ptr<XScalarEntry> entryy1 = *axisY1();
00169     shared_ptr<XScalarEntry> entryz = *axisZ();
00170     
00171     if(m_graph) releaseChild(m_graph);
00172     m_graph = create<XGraph>(getName().c_str(), false);
00173     m_graphForm.reset(new FrmGraph(g_pFrmMain));
00174     m_graphForm->m_graphwidget->setGraph(m_graph);
00175 
00176     if(!entryx || !entryy1) return;
00177   
00178     m_livePlot = 
00179         m_graph->plots()->create<XXYPlot>((m_graph->getName() + "-Live").c_str(), false, m_graph);
00180     m_livePlot->label()->value(m_graph->getLabel() + " Live");
00181     m_storePlot = 
00182         m_graph->plots()->create<XXYPlot>((m_graph->getName() + "-Stored").c_str(), false, m_graph);
00183     m_storePlot->label()->value(m_graph->getLabel() + " Stored");
00184 
00185     atomic_shared_ptr<const XNode::NodeList> axes_list(m_graph->axes()->children());
00186     shared_ptr<XAxis> axisx = dynamic_pointer_cast<XAxis>(axes_list->at(0));
00187     shared_ptr<XAxis> axisy = dynamic_pointer_cast<XAxis>(axes_list->at(1));
00188   
00189     axisx->ticLabelFormat()->value(entryx->value()->format());
00190     axisy->ticLabelFormat()->value(entryy1->value()->format());
00191     m_livePlot->axisX()->value(axisx);
00192     m_livePlot->axisY()->value(axisy);
00193     m_storePlot->axisX()->value(axisx);
00194     m_storePlot->axisY()->value(axisy);
00195   
00196     axisx->length()->value(0.95 - *axisx->x());
00197     axisy->length()->value(0.90 - *axisy->y());
00198     if(entryz) {
00199         shared_ptr<XAxis> axisz = m_graph->axes()->create<XAxis>(
00200             "Z Axis", false, XAxis::DirAxisZ, false, m_graph);
00201         axisz->ticLabelFormat()->value(entryz->value()->format());
00202         m_livePlot->axisZ()->value(axisz);
00203         m_storePlot->axisZ()->value(axisz);
00204 //  axisz->label()->value("Z Axis");
00205         axisz->label()->value(entryz->getLabel());
00206     }
00207   
00208     m_storePlot->pointColor()->value(clGreen);
00209     m_storePlot->lineColor()->value(clGreen);
00210     m_storePlot->barColor()->value(clGreen);
00211     m_storePlot->displayMajorGrid()->value(false);
00212     m_livePlot->maxCount()->value(4000);
00213     m_storePlot->maxCount()->value(4000);
00214     axisx->label()->value(entryx->getLabel());
00215     axisy->label()->value(entryy1->getLabel());
00216     m_graph->label()->value(getLabel());
00217 
00218     m_lsnLiveChanged = entryx->value()->onValueChanged().connectWeak(
00219         shared_from_this(), &XValGraph::onLiveChanged);
00220     entryy1->value()->onValueChanged().connect(m_lsnLiveChanged);
00221     if(entryz) entryz->value()->onValueChanged().connect(m_lsnLiveChanged);
00222   
00223     m_lsnStoreChanged = entryx->storedValue()->onValueChanged().connectWeak(
00224         shared_from_this(), &XValGraph::onStoreChanged);
00225     entryy1->storedValue()->onValueChanged().connect(m_lsnStoreChanged);
00226     if(entryz) entryz->storedValue()->onValueChanged().connect(m_lsnStoreChanged);
00227   
00228     showGraph();
00229 }
00230 
00231 void
00232 XValGraph::clearAllPoints()
00233 {
00234     if(!m_graph) return;
00235     m_storePlot->clearAllPoints();
00236     m_livePlot->clearAllPoints();
00237 }
00238 void
00239 XValGraph::onLiveChanged(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &)
00240 {
00241     double x, y, z = 0.0;
00242     shared_ptr<XScalarEntry> entryx = *axisX();
00243     shared_ptr<XScalarEntry> entryy1 = *axisY1();
00244     shared_ptr<XScalarEntry> entryz = *axisZ();
00245     
00246     if(!entryx || !entryy1) return;
00247     x = *entryx->value();
00248     y = *entryy1->value();
00249     if(entryz) z = *entryz->value();
00250   
00251     m_livePlot->addPoint(x, y, z);
00252 }
00253 void
00254 XValGraph::onStoreChanged(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &)
00255 {
00256     double x, y, z = 0.0;
00257     shared_ptr<XScalarEntry> entryx = *axisX();
00258     shared_ptr<XScalarEntry> entryy1 = *axisY1();
00259     shared_ptr<XScalarEntry> entryz = *axisZ();
00260     
00261     if(!entryx || !entryy1) return;
00262     x = *entryx->storedValue();
00263     y = *entryy1->storedValue();
00264     if(entryz) z = *entryz->storedValue();
00265   
00266     m_storePlot->addPoint(x, y, z);
00267 }
00268 void
00269 XValGraph::showGraph()
00270 {
00271     if(m_graphForm) {
00272         m_graphForm->setWindowTitle(i18n("Graph - ") + getLabel() );
00273         m_graphForm->show();
00274     }
00275 }

00278     : XCustomTypeListNode<XValGraph>(name, runtime),
00279       m_entries(entries)

00281 }
